item.title: 10 Actors Who Replaced Movie Legends & Succeeded
item.description: While movie legends may have originated iconic film roles, other actors have managed to recapture the magic of the character successfully.

item.title: The Best Alien Movie In 38 Years Is Now Streaming
item.description: Alien: Romulus is now streaming on Hulu, and it's well worth checking out for any Alien fan who's been disappointed by every movie since Aliens.

item.title: Scream 7: Yellowstone Franchise Star In Talks To Play Sidney's Daughter
item.description: Scream 7 might have found Sidney Prescott's daughter, with a Yellowstone franchise star currently in talks for the role in the slasher series.
